replies.body:
nice to know man :)
But as the rules say it's not allowed sadly :c
replies.body_tagged:
nice to know man :)
But as the rules say it's not allowed sadly :c

replies.body:
In the rules Section E "7. Discussions surrounding personal updates, accomplishments or events is frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person. Punishments for this will only be distributed in the event that a user continuously uses the forums for this purpose alone."

Use Skype for this kind of stuff please.

Locking.
